about_the_game:
This game is a life simulator that combines car building and customization with survival challenges. You play as a 22-year-old who starts with a pile of loose parts and must assemble and tune your car from scratch. The goal is to create a functional vehicle that can be used in thrilling races and to earn money through various jobs.

The game features an expansive map to explore, where you can participate in competitions and face survival challenges. Repair, assemble, and upgrade various parts of your car, and customize it with a wide range of performance components. Additionally, you can drive other vehicles and live a full life within the game, performing tasks, managing your needs, and interacting with the environment.

Features:

  • Build a car from scratch, adjusting and customizing every part.
  • Drive various vehicles beyond the main car.
  • Experience a full life in the game, with work, challenges, and daily interactions.
  • Explore a vast map including urban and rural areas.
  • Participate in races and tackle survival challenges.

Prepare for a rich, immersive experience, where every detail matters and adventure is always within reach.

  • Processor: 3.0 GHz

  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
